title: Spain Exhumes Franco’s Body Following Protracted Legal Battle
text:
MADRID—Spain on Thursday exhumed the remains of former dictator Francisco Franco, concluding a protracted battle that has revived divisions over how to commemorate the country’s painful 20th-century history.

Authorities exhumed the body of the former dictator from the basilica in the Valley of the Fallen, a vast war memorial hewed into a mountainside. description: The remains of former dictator Francisco Franco were exhumed, concluding a protracted battle that has revived divisions over how to commemorate Spain’s painful 20th-century history.
